alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lumpkin; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 8:32PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lumpkin, southwestern Union and southeastern Fannin Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 832 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Gooch Mountain Shelter, or near Dahlonega, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Suches, Margret, Camp Merrill, Hawk Mountain Shelter, Porter Springs, Turners Corner, Nimblewill, Woods Hole Shelter, Blood Mountain Shelter, Gaddistown and Gooch Mountain Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
